scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Arnow wrote a few pieces of poetry, but she did not have great success. It is unclear if she attempted to publish many pieces on her own. The two known published pieces in this collection, To Know the Rain and Ode to a Purple Aluminum Christmas Tree, are listed as found poems by Ronald W. Butler, suggesting that they were originally published elsewhere. A rejection slip from Kosmos mentions Logic as being amusing (Box 103, Folder 7). Because most of the rejection slips are form letters, it is difficult to assess which are for short fiction and which are for poetry.
